Translations.Text: isee prakaar nahin aaya unake paas jo in (makka vaasiyon) se poorv rahe koee rasool, parantu unhonne kaha ki jaadoogar ya paagal hai
kya ve ek-doosare ko vasiyyat[1] kar chuke hain isakee? balki ve ullanghanakaaree log hain
to aap mukh pher len unase. aapakee koee ninda nahin hai
aur aap shiksha dete rahen. isalie ki shiksha laabhaprad hai imaan vaalon ke lie
aur nahin utpann kiya hai mainne jinn tatha manushy ko, parantu taaki meree hee ibaadat karen
main nahin chaahata hoon unase koee jeevika aur na chaahata hoon ki ve mujhe khilaayen
avashy allaah hee jeevika daata, shaktishaalee, balavaan hai
to in atyaachaariyon ke paap hain inake saathiyon ke paapon ke samaan, atah utaavale na banen
antatah, vinaash hai kaafiron ke lie unake us din[1] se, jisase he daraaye ja rahe hain
shapath hai toor[1] (parvat) kee
aur likhee huee pustak[1] kee
jo jhillee ke khule pannon mein likhee huee hai
tatha baitul maamoor (aabaad[1] ghar) kee
tatha oonchee chhat (aakaash) kee
aur bhadakaaye hue saagar[1] kee
vastutah, aapake paalanahaar kee yaatana hokar rahegee
nahin hai use koee rokane vaala
jis din aakaash dagamagaayega
tatha parvat chalenge
to vinaash hai us din, jhuthalaane vaalon ke lie
jo vivaad mein khel rahe hain
jis din ve dhakka diye jaayenge narak kee agni kee or
(unase kaha jaayegaah) yahee vah narak hai, jise tum jhuthala rahe the
